ygData.subject: AC and weight...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, I am a relatively new member of the EverQuest family.On the E Chi world I just reached 8th lvl, moments ago actualy, And have many Q s regarding the
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all, I am a relatively new member of the EverQuest family.On the E'Chi world I just reached 8th lvl, moments ago actualy, And have many Q's regarding the intricacies of playing the ever loved Monk. I read in some of the recent posts about AC-weight considerations and would like to "trim the fat" so to speak from my armor.
As of now I have a Leather, shirt, pants, shoulder, gloves, mask, cap, A cloth cape a mesh bracers and raw hide boots. Now keeping in mind that I am working with a tight budget, Nay, make that a VERY tight budget, what whould be your suggestions on what I should keep/acquire.
Thank you for your time.
Zarvitz
8th lvl monk.
